kay raych, maryosep tol, dami nating dinaanan.. (inuman) at kung ano ano pa.. pero pasado..salamat sa video na ginawa mo.. naiyak ako yung isang mata lang.. pero tol. alam ko alam mo. na mahal kita, away tayo bukas.. hehe.. wee...

kay donna,ace, micael,red,rubs, at feddy.. ang original kabarkada :))

sa mga roomates at hausmates ko sa bahay ni kuya alvin :)) salamat sa pagpapasaya ng buhay ko.

sa family ni jaj.. sa lahat lahat ng support.
sa mga kumupkop sa kin (parang ulila.. hahaha!) tita flor at tito joey
sa mga batang pamangkin ko.. para sa stress-relieving moments..

kay jaj, salamat sa pagpapahiram mo ng laptop,  sa pagiging driver ko ng walang bayad, sa mga jokes na sobrang corny, kay engot,sa mga chocolates, di ko kayang i enumerate.
alam mo na yun. di ko na kelangan sabihin. biggest thanks.. di ko natapos to ng di kita kasama.

sa Diyos, maraming salamat po for blessing me with these people.

unang yugto:

nanay: bakit ba tlga kayo nagbreak ng boypren mo?
anak: di ko alam eh.
nanay: (tumunog ang cellphone...)

       ok naman po kami, yung bisyo lang po tlga nya ang problema.
                                                                   -lovelots,
                                                                      boypren

anak: putek.

ikalawang yugto:

nanay: umiinom ka na pala?
anak: (hmmm?)
nanay: aba! eh yun ang sabi ng boypren mo.
anak: occassional yun!
tatay: siguro palagi kang lasing? baka pumapasok ka pa ng lasing ka.
anak: hindi kaya. occassional lang tlga.
tatay: eh bakit naman magagalit kung occassional?
anak: magaling timing nya, dumadalaw sha pag may okasyon.

anak: lusot?

ikatlong yugto:

tatay: aba! eh baliktad pa, ikaw pa ang binabawalan magyosi at mag alak.
nanay: kaya nga, kaya ka sinasabihan kasi dumadalas,
            sabi ko nga sapukin ka ng matauhan ka.
anak: subukan nya lang.
tatay: kaya nakipagbreak siguro yun sa yo, kasi nangingikil ka pa ng pang pulutan.
         baka di mo sha namukaan, tinutukan mo, hinihingan mo pa ng pang inom.

anak: putek.

for the past few weeks, my life was just about thesis and acads and dsp lab..

i really felt so restless.. imagine not having the time to even comb your hair? hahaha... papasok ka sa class ng 7am.. then i'll go home 9pm, na hindi pa nagbbreak for the whole day.. i know it's unhealthy.. pero ganun siguro tlga when you can't afford to stop.. every minute means a lot.. :)

it's a great relief na nabawasan na lahat..

busy pa rin.. pero at least nakakasuklay na ko at nakakapagblog :) yey!

Naisip ko lang to write about this kasi i feel this is more than just coincidence.

Five months ago, i was really planning to get out of my church for some reasons that i do not really understand. Landslide tlga yung faith ko. Siguro yun tlga yun. Effect na din ng lahat ng nangyari for the past years. Kaya nga when i got my incomplete grade sa eee 105. I didn't even bother to wonder. Di na rin ako nagreklamo. I know it was because of that.

After those months, i still go to church. Pero honestly, it was all different- the feeling that you can't connect. ganun. and forgive me for the term but it really sucks.Umabot pa sa point that i can't even pray dahil nahihiya na ko tlga.

i was having my daily dose of text conversations/sermon with jaj nung naalala ko yung transfer ko that i got from the church sa QC. I was going to the church without letting them monitor kung nakapunta nga ako. To explain it simply,  wala akong record kasi nasa kin nga.

I was sort of nagsusumbong dahil nga dun sa text messages ni ralph sa kin. After almost years na di na naman kami nag-uusap about us and what had happened, he accused me of destroying his relationship. He told me na i sort of planned a scheme to put him in an awkward situation na di nya matatanggihan, and un nga. I don't even know his girl personally. All i know is her name and the fact that they are both from BA.And wala din akong makitang reason why i would still wanna do that dahil nung summer naman we saw each other and we're pretty good. O well, the conversation ended with him calling me as a "sick bitch." He even told me i was capable of making stories and set-ups.

At that time, i wanted to pretend that it's all cool. But then, i can't.

Maybe it really matters to me, he became a part of my life and his opinions do count kasi he became important to me. My family liked him and some of my friends still do. (Pero when they hear this, i don't think ganun pa din).

Mejo naguguluhan tlga ko and i was really crying myself to sleep. Weak tlga ko when it comes to friends saying not-so-decent things about me. And i also know for a fact, na di ko naman ginawa. I should be unaffected but i can't play the role very well. Siguro dahil mag isa na naman ako sa boarding house kaya ganun. I don't really know.

Anyways, yun nga. Nag-uusap kami about that when my cousin texted me. It was a forwarded quote about faith and then suddenly naalala ko nga na it's about time that i should return the file back. I told Jaj about it and he was happy. (I know he had been praying for it for months) He was even supportive of the idea that i should change number para di na kami magkatext ni ralph.

The day after that was our regular thursday church "together." (Sa loob kasi ng church di naman kame nagkikita. hehe) Pero i felt relieved nung nakita ko xa. Dahil siguro alam ko na rin na may kasama na ko. Nasa panic mode pa ko and i was asking him kung pano ako uuwi ng Laguna. (Dahil out of way sa kanya.) He told me to not worry and even told me "Nagmamadali ka ba?" Haha. So i just shut up.

The preach was for me. I know and i felt it. Palabas na kami when he held my hand and told me "Narinig mo teksto o nakatulog ka?" habang natatawa pa xa. Di na lang ako nagcomment. Hehe. He told me to fix my stuff and then we'll eat out.

After that, pumunta pa kami ng taft para maencode  (nya)  yung "salaysay" ko. (na xa gumawa. hehe) It was a letter na nag-aapologize for getting that file and for keeping it. Tapos dun na rin ako sumakay sa Buendia bus station to Laguna.

Right now, i feel so relieved that i'm going back to Church. Siguro nga this is what's been missing kaya feeling ko din na parang may kulang. :) Yung kay ralph, bahala na xa dun. Di ko na rin makita yung point kung makikipag-usap pa ko about it dahil wala na ring sense, the damage is done.

Hopefully, lahat will fall to its place and kahit may sakit na nman ako, i do feel that i'm gonna be all right. :)

note: nagpromise na si jaj about the tagaytay trip sa birthday ko. hehehe. i want some time off from EEE and the pressure from graduating as well. :)

after months of rigorous work and days of no sleep..i've learned the important details of the job.. i even tried questioning myself at some point, some of the sacrifices don't make much sense.. instead of gaining new friends by being sociable and all, you only end up having people around you making every work seem harder.

i could never deny the fact that at some point, i might have missed..  maybe because i lack the experience or the passion to work perhaps. I deal with strangers and i don't know how they think- that fact was very dangerous.

I failed because all the while, i was finding self-gain.. that maybe somehow i could have something all for yourself. But then when all works were being thrown right on my face, i began to panic.. not only because i might disappoint myself but the whole committee.. and then the idea of self-gratification ceased, all that was left is pub work. nothing more.. nothing less..

Yes. I became obsessive with what i do. Up to some point maybe that the scope of my job widened. I am a publicity officer and my main duty is to keep all event of the committee publicized.. but then i find it hard to focus on just a single task -- making avps.

Being exposed to so much pub works, there was a time i called the committee a 'slave committee.' All things that you should do depends on other committee's decision. You should be aware of the tiniest detail just to effectively publicize and promote it.

I love the job.

Though there are times i feel that the job was not for me. The first time we had an internal conflict in the committee, i thought about filing a resignation. All because it was not in my intentions to hurt anybody or to involve myself personally.. I wanted a working relationship, with each of the members of the committee just to make all plans materialize..

Having meetings till midnight and working for a pub project overnight, you can't help but just to be close to them.. Having wonderful lunch and dinners, you can't help but to be used to their company up to some point when all of you speak in a certain accent and utter words that other groups find odd. You become a part of a group that aims for one thing - fruitful regime.

Having meetings till midnight and burning shoulders, sometimes you can't help but to hate them for sometimes being so nosy.. or maybe just being critical.. Sometimes, when the time's not so good, you can't help but to just be annoyed with what they do.. or maybe with what you just can't accomplish..

It's just sometimes hard to accept that while there are those people who seem to be great workers, there are still those who are even greater. This realization is often left misunderstood. You envy and spend your time pulling them down instead of being inspired and pushing yourself up.

The whole FOPC season was incredible. I was left tired. Yeah. But i was richer by having 21 friends.

We may not be the best steercomm officers, or maybe even a lousy one. But one thing we are most proud of is that despite all transitions, we manage to pull things together.

thanks a lot guys! :)

Salamt din sa lahat ng mem orgs :)

I need not to mention all of you.. who worked their asses off just to provide great publicity.. It was because of those people who worked with dedication who made so inspired and be still alive even without any sleep for two straight days. :)

Thanks Danes! :) Great Danes ka tlga :)

This would just be the start of our great friendship.. :) haha.. You told me i can do all of these, that's why i was able to do it somehow. The tireness is nothing compared to so much fun and bunch of new experiences :)

i don't know why this song still have its effect on me.. yeah, maybe a part of me was broken there at a place where somebody left me.. maybe i'm a little bit too sensitive at this moment.. or maybe i'm getting numb.. i really don't know.. maybe someone would step up and just tell me i'm a hypocrite.. or maybe i'm forcing myself to fall.. or to divert everything there that could be diverted.. i was gonna say, i'm just happy.. or maybe even having this little contentment.. or maybe i'm just getting wiser.. i'm taking my time.. although mine's not plenty.. i wanna give myself a chance again.. or maybe i'm just being impatient.. i'm not sure.. of anything.. it's a shame to admit.. that i might need your help.. ..again.. i really wanna be in full control of everything that slipped.. but i guess it's just that i can't have control.. for whenever i do.. i mess up.. :( and maybe someone would step up and just tell me i'm continuously hurting you.. or i am just playing again.. i was gonna say, i'm just happy.. with you around.. and i feel sorry for the things that were not meant to be said.. words that should never be written.. i want a start.. not a continuation.. i'll see you lunch tomorrow.. :)

first stop: the manila pavilion

the lobby was full of people from different parts of the globe.. talking in their own native languages.. which i do not really understand.

yeah.. i don't understand.. how it all started.. was i wrong?
they continue to blurt out words.. which for me are just symbols.. pointing on a single issue..
but why can't they just speak in English?
.. in a way that i could totally comprehend
..talk to me..
..in a manner in which i don't have to do puzzles..

second stop: jollibee

i ordered a large fries just to feed my ever-so-complaining stomach.. i just ate a bar of chocolate and drank yakult for breakfast.. it's becoming a normal routine for me lately.. those were anti-depressants for me..

maybe i'm a lil' depressed..
is "lil'" the right word to describe how low i feel?

i wish i could wear the jollibee costume for this day.. i want to smile.. i want a big grin on my face.. so as to not disappoint the two japanese guy that i'll tour for the day.

it pains me..
but it's not the image of me that i wanna show..
i pretend not to care..
and i would have to do it everyday..
i have to do the act of smiling..
greeting everyone a nice day..
like a fastfood crew..

third stop: starbucks, Tagaytay City

the view from up there was great.. the water was so calm and stagnant.. you could observe the lake's depth by distinguishing the color of its waters. The perilous deep part is blue.. the shallow one's green..

there's the volcano surrounded by waters.. just standing there as if it can't harm anyone in its surroundings.. playing dead.. although it's very active inside..

i've known you.. the part of you that's blue and the part that is green..
but as you play dead.. the more i tend to worry..
how i wish that i could just ignore it.. the beauty of our friendship.. that captivated me..
you seem to be so peaceful.. seems that you can't harm..
but by just standing there as i observe you.. you could break me..

burst it out.. all the lavas flowing inside.. no matter how destructive it could cost..

fourth stop: Josephine's restaurant, Tagaytay City

We ordered seafood paella, crabs, squid, and prawns.. (hands down to the chef!).. the place was indeed lovely.. i can still see the volcano and the peaceful lake.. We had great conversations.. about sushis and sashimis.. about italian pasta.. about the current Philippine economic situation.. the call center industries spreading so fast like a plague..

We had a lot of moments together such as this.. eating together and having a lot of laughs..
What happened? were they all forgotten?
..lost in the same manner as how the depressing current situation of the country swept away our smiles..
i miss those times just hanging around.. eating together..
but thinking about how much you've hurt me and made me felt like i don't exist..
i don't even wanna long for those times again..
yeah.. you can make me smile.. this much..
and you can make me cry.. million times as much..

next stop: fruit stand

to be continued...

It was out of pure faith..

i felt my shoulders shuddering and heard my voice breaking. Inch by inch, i could feel you moving closer to me.. Looking intently at my bowed head.. watching my teardrops as they roll down my cheeks and fall onto my skirt.  You cupped your hands on my face and asked me

 Why are your tears not colored red?
I am disappointed on you. After almost 8 years of having known me, you suddenly forgot that i exist.. how come? 
Now you're here at my house..during your times of strife.. begging for mercy and for my help.. what could i do for you? 
when you were giggling, giving out your best laugh, did you honestly thought about me?
run to them.. to those people you can trust.. to those people you love so much.. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

i was never that blessed..

I do not belong to those group of girls who can buy fancy clothes.. nice bags and slippers.. expensive stuffs.. or even go to high-end places.. but i know i am not lacking..
I continue to feel contentment.. that eventhough i don't get everything that i want, i just take them positively -- that maybe they were not for me.. i don't deserve such things.. 
material things are not the best things that life could offer.. and so they're not for me..

the comfort that you need.. everytime you want to have a break from all the stresses of your life...
the overflowing love that you long for.. everytime you feel alone..
all the things that could make you feel complete.. in me.. you will find

I won't have to share how i think deprived i am.. coz i don't take it that way..
being in lack of something serves as my motivation to continue struggling..

I am not endowed with much intelligence..

as an engineer.. i can't rate myself as one of the exceptional ones..
in such field, you have to deal with tangible things.. the ones that you can manipulate.. 
like signals.. electric and magnetic fields..
calculate resistance.. calculate voltages.. calculate current..

formulate an eqution for: 
 a. the intensity of resistance.. when you can't move on after a broken relationship.. 
 b. the amplitude of trust.. you tend to give your friends as time passes..
 c. the rate flow of fear.. when you found out you're in the middle of strangers..

there is more to life than all those things and i would wanna learn them too..

I am not pure.. i  was never..
though i always try to be.. impurities still surround me..
temptations.. that corrupts your spirit..  they are the greatest enemies..
I never felt like i am any better than criminals behind bars.. for i know inside my heart.. 
i am a prisoner..
of my own beliefs and principles..
that no matter how hard i try to change.. i couldn't. 
they are my part.. small pieces that makes up my soul.. and it is through my soul's completion that i'll be truly happy..

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I decided to walk away.. because i know i am a great shame.. to you and to your house
you have offered me with so much that i can't reciprocate all things.. by just offering service.. 
coz i know.. you're looking for more than that..

you put my soul in transparency.. and saw all the things i feel and believe..
if further staying inside, destroys every inch of my faith.. i'll choose to be alone and retain the same image of you..

i know that in this world, you're the only one that completely see right through me..
the only one who could understand.. even before i explain..
and now that i lost my wings.. and feel wounded.. 
i know you will heal me..

I am never blessed.. of material things.. of intelligence.. of physical beauty..
but having you.. is more than enough..
and everyday.. i promise to long for the same things..

the beauty of every sunset..
the smile of my loved ones..
the relief i feel when praying...

i am sorry.. i disappointed you..
but please.. adopt  me.. everyday

I spent all my life looking for two hearts; that might beat as one.
My eyes are tired trying to hit them on the right spot; so they won't bleed to death.
I already underwent an operation.. to fix my eyes and get rid of cataract..
nobody wanted me to quit.. eventhough i am past my retiring age..

I even sacrificed my own affections just to fulfill all that i have promised.
In honor of my duty, i denied the slightest call of my own desires.
The train of youth has left me.. 
and the only thing i value now is my responsibility.
I tried.. with an immeasurable effort to made couples stick with each other.
I focused.. until the sole source of ultimate joy is the kiss of true love.

Now you're complaining. In each and every prayer you utter all night.
After years of harmoniously sharing your lives, he woke up one day feeling drained and unsatisfied.
With breaking voice and shaking locked hands, you felt your world disappered before your eyes.
Your tears were flowing down like waterfalls, your eyes lost inside the dark caves of your soul.

Maybe my  bow and arrow lost their magic.
All the while i thought, the power of it will be for forever.
Like love, as they all say, will last for all ages.
But as my body weaken, the intensity and pressure of each shot decreases monotonically.
Until maybe the effect ceases... 

Oy maybe i miscalculated the degree of your compatibiltiy.
The both of you were not the perfect match.
It was one of those days perhaps, i forgot to wear my lenses or i must have dropped it.
i'm so sorry... this was all my fault.. i never anticipated this moment would come.


I saw him.. 
I saw her.. 
staring passionately at each other..
they held hands..
kissed..
love calculator beeped.. it was my time to do my part...

Due to old age, i forgot i already hit him with my arrow before..
Some i hit thrice...or even more than that...
After centuries of playing with hearts, i realize i failed...
Coz here you are, crying before me.
On the busiest day of my life..
The softest whisper of bitter words made me carry a heavy heart.. 
Till i can't help but to fall down...

I felt the ground..
The rocks slowly wounding the delicate soles of my feet...
The dusts leaving stains on the spotless piece of cloth covering me...

I looked around.. saw two men holding each other's hand.
One of them i also heard weeping the other night..
Begging for a love that's so free from prejudice.
What i saw in their eyes, i never saw with any other couples before.
The strongest bond of their spirit brought their hearts too close..
and their pulses speak of nothing but each other's name.

Is love unbounded?

I saw a man riding on a jeepney.
he closed his eyes, and started dreaming...
the thought of them kissing... making love on the carpeted floor..
I remembered our first encounter...
The probability of them not ending up summed up to a high figure.
Only because of his indifference...that was only at the surface..
I trusted my instincts... i followed my logic...
I never gave them the chance to have the shot and go for love...
Now he was left there... thinking of no one except her.

Does love conquers all?

I saw a lady.. with gray eyes and long black hair.
Sparkling jewelries and beautiful shoes her husband gives her..
Her body.. her soul.. she gave in return..
she wanted to have him..
wrap her long black hair around his neck..
hear him gasp for his breath and beg for life..
she wanted to own him.. 
bathe with him on a deep beach
pull him down..watch him drown
observe his facial and bodily movements as he desperately keep his head above the water.  
plug a projector in his temples and watch his thoughts like a film..
she knows...she's not the only one in there...
She loves him  too much.. 
He loves her... out of pity...

Is love really unselfish?


Will i shoot them?

I just wanna lie down..
Listen to your cry..
Savor the bitter taste of failure..
and wait patiently for my sweet death.

-stupid cupid-

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
happy valentine's day everyone.
I still believe in love.. don't worry :)

I stopped wanting for love.. i know it's not yet for me. 
"i should rest" literally.. figuratively..











"There is no remedy for love but to love more."
- Henry David Thoreau

launching...

I was standing on a cemented parking lot.. with aching neck and body.. i was thinking about me, standing there during that moment. I found it kinda odd.. after days of not having lunch with my friends.. i was hanging out with them.. again.. after the cold holiday season break..

I had my new year's wish.. the same old wish for five consecutive years.. I was just gazing at the sky.. just observing its vastness.. its emptiness..
Will i be able to nail it this year? I was given another chance to experience another new year's eve..another chance to wish..

---
Every new year's eve, i always try to watch aerial fireworks.. i've always believe that they bring blessings.. that they will color your sky not only for that night but all year 'round.. that the loud sounds will fill all silence that sadness brings.. that the lights will send you to enlightenment..

the midnight came.. count downs were off.. car alarms gone wild.. an indescribable chaos.. i can't perceive even a single tone.. i can't see a thing.. but i'm so sure that all these were happening.. a hundred percent..

New year's day had come.. all i wanted is to be asleep.. so i won't see the same old images.. i won't hear the same sound.. won't have to do the same things.. i wanted a new start.. don't wanna wait for the whistles.. the horns.. the greetings.. the usual celebration..

I turned off my phone.. never greeted anyone.. i just prayed.. and went back to sleep..
---

sparkling...

Golden sparkles started to appear in the sky.. forming a spherical shape.. they were like gems.. gigantic ones.. covering the black dull sky.. i was so amazed..uttered wows in different levels of excitement.. they were awesome..

I started having doubts.. "should i be here or should i be somewhere else?" or the right question would be "Do they ever want me here?" I don't wanna be the cause of delay..or of anything that could ruin their first night out for this year..
The colorful rings appeared.. they were like moving closer and closer towards me..I felt nauseous.. for the nth time.. felt the baggages pulling my shoulders down.. "why was I here?"

A certain chaos.. "i can't be here"..

Then I started smiling ang giving out some laughs.. not the fake ones.. i was with some friends.. and they were having a good time.. giggling at even the corniest joke.. you could see them teary-eyed.. still laughing out loud.. 

---
I wish i could get her smile.. paste it to my face.. laugh the way she does.. "am i that miserable, up to a point that smiling became a luxury?"

Having another year sounded not so good to me.. another year.. sounded too much..
I tried to think 'bout some things.. on how i can change my life.. to turn it into something quite fun.. considered a lot of new additions.. new friends.. new someone special.. new look..new contact number.. but nothing made much sense..

For years, i have been used to memory-erasing.. eliminating things that makes my life uncomfortable..just forgetting 'bout them.. hoping it'll make everything turn out right..
For years, i have been suffering from the same dilemma.. having unfulfilled years.. i didn't improve..
For this year i've decided, i should live life alone in my own thinking box... 
---

booming...

The delayed booming sound came next.. making all those people gain much energy.. still alive at 1am..

I could hear  it clearly now.. i'm having another new year's eve with my closest friends.. headaches and pains quickly vanished with just two 500mg tablets and a coke light.. 

I wanted to indulge.. in gazing at those amazing flashes of gunpowder.. forming different light colors and shapes.. 

hearts that signify love.. 
spheres that signify completeness..
lines that symbolize eternity.. 

I wanted to freeze the time.. or just to make it run a bit slower.. to treasure the moment i'm having.. so that for every doubt that i have inside comes with a certain reason why i wanna stick with them.. 

they make me feel worthed..

---
what comes next when you think you're standing right on the edge of the gutter?.. should you fall and let all sadness blankets you every new year's eve?.. stay pessimistic on everything and continue playing the role of a depressed and disturbed soul?

should you be nostalgic? hang on to something that's now nowhere to be found? put your high hopes on a nine-digit number that could mean something or might mean nothing at all?

does new year means brand new? or just a restoration of  some remnants of your last year's life? 

should a beautiful start of friendship be hindered with some issues of the past? or should a friendship be sacrificed for the sake of some unwanted feelings and just accept that fate led me farther away from that circle?  
---

vanishing flashes...

marks of gold lightens up the sky.. now that the fireworks display is over.. the black sky is once again owned solely by the moon.. A constant dot... and nothing more..

---
i wanted to forget about friendship.. it's a crime i chose the other thing over it.. i tried to embrace both.. but i wasn't able to have a good grasp of either one of them  that in the end, i held nothing back.. 

the nearness is more than enough.. all the while i thought it would work.. 
the next thing i know, i can't be a friend.. i can't make you smile..
will memory-erasing still work? for such beautiful bond covered with much affection?
---

after all the wrong things I've done.. improper reactions and emotions.. ever-changing moods and decisions.. i was left tired but still smiling.. my aerial sparkles are now out of sight.. but then i still have the moon.. the constant friends whom I will share laughs at the end of the day..

Yeah, they don't tell me that nothing's wrong but they assure me that everything will be fine.. whenever I lose hope.. they give me more faith..  much more faith.. that never made me feel empty-handed.. I did appreciate the display..but  what i enjoyed most are the funtimes.. negotiating with mr. fruitas crew.. and shopping unknown tastes of bread.. slumping with exhaustion at the cemented pavement.. taking cool pictures.. discussing ways to go home.. 
--- 
the wonderful side of friendship.. is that it gives you sense of security.. that somehow you won't have to go through life alone.. you can cry for help.. and get a lot.. be left satisfied 'coz you expected a lot less..

the other face, always make your heart and mind fight the dirty battle..
a heart hoping some things might imply another..
a mind constricting and supressing your heart's desires...

friendship draws a visible borderline.. 
i just can't make the two different areas distinct..
---

riding a taxi with a chip in money on hand..[ that's what you call concern and accountability.. that's what makes me feel secured.. thank you guys so much! hehehe]

Yeah, a lot of times i feel like i don't belong.. like i should be someplace else.. in a dimension where our lines don't meet.. but then, i just can't leave it all hanging.. for some unknown reasons, i always end up looking for the same old persons.. 

i always end up.. feeling this need to be with them...
i wanna be with them.. i love being with them.. 


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
inspired by a girl with the sweetest smile..

no matter how hard you try,
you can't find sensible reasons why you love a person.. 
love is itself insane and based on the most illogical principles..
stay happy.. be crazy.. keep smiling..

***

As the crowd started to cheer, i felt churning in my stomach.. It may be excitement or fear.. still indeterminate.
A liquid that could make you lose yourself for hours and convert reality into dreams effortlessly.. that could bring heart palpitations.. send you to a universe where everything is rotating on you..even the sun.. just some glasses of it.. then one more.. a single drop.. the last drop.. transfiguration  begins!

i was the protagonist .. and nobody could lay his hands upon me.. or touch my soul.. or rip my heart out.. i'm invulnerable.
I feel the power growing in the palm of my hands.. making me lose the center of gravity.. heat waves flourishing.. continuously flowing in my veins.. in my arteries.. in each and every cell of my body.. i felt agitated.. i felt  the need to release the energy..

i was  sober..i saw myself blabbering like a lead actress in an opera without  scripts.. With each word comes a single blink .. i felt my lashes becoming abnormally heavy.. the next moment, i rested my head onto something that's fixed.. and i saw my world rotating around me.. i had reach it.. the effect of the liquid i sipped.. 

seconds passed, i noticed blurry objects.. it was like a moving oil painting.. my own work of art.. The next minute, i realized its beauty vanished with time.. in my fantasies they were mixed melted crayons.. but in my reality they were but combined images.. which meant nothing.

i closed my eyes.. still saw all my dreams collide.. it seemed my life was attacked by a vortex of air destroying the orderliness of my unharmed world.. what have i done? 

i didn't want to push myself across the border that lies between my sanity and insanity.. all i wanna have is a pause.. a break from all my earthly worries.. 

what have i done?

i smelled  the perspiration..permeating throughout the entire room..  they were dripping out.. and i was the fountain of the same liquid i drank.. still i felt warm.. but this time, it was burnin' me slowly.. and i had this pain so excruciating i'd gladly choose to die than suffer. My numbness was gone.. and so was the power.. i was then the opressed.. 

i couldn't focus on just a single thing.. and i continued cursing myself.. for all the wrong decisions.. for choosing the wrong way when i was at crossroads.. for disappointing the people who cares.. for not meeting my own expectations.. for indulging myself into drunkenness that made me realize all these things.. for having no logical reasons at all..

i developed a ball of anger and threw it at myself.. i started to vomit.. release all the toxins of liquor.. all the stuffs i ate.. all the gastric juices.. my bile.. my blood.. finally, i was left fragile.. my knees so weak and my hands were shaking.. 

i continued cursing myself.. make noises which no one could interpret..till i fell asleep..

***

i don't know what magic does it brings.. why do you still need to have it?  
It just caused you to turn away from reality.. i told you, you can't live in your dreams.. don't be nostalgic. your time has passed..all you can do is to look ahead.. 

i'm sorry sometimes i tend to disrespect you.. by doing such, it doesn't mean i don't mind your importance..it's just that sometimes, i feel like i don't wanna listen.. to all the sob stories and depressing thoughts.. it causes me pain and pessimism.. i don't wanna look at life the way you do.. like it's been so unfair.. for it's not. We were given our own chances.. the time of our lives.. and you wasted spme of yours.. 

it's not yet done.. you're still here.. focus on something that's more important.. your baggages are already heavy, don't make it heavier.. (by carrying a big belly *wink) 

i love you for if i don't, i won't have to think of you all night.. whether you managed to go home.. 
but lately, i was worried..i don't have the same fear ..

i don't wanna wait for that moment when i don't feel like waiting for you before i sleep..
i don't wanna anticipate the time when i'm not even listening at all..
you have your obligations..
and i know you're smart..

don't get drunk.. 
just this new year..
for 20 years i've kept my fingers crossed..
enough of the fights...
i'm completely tired of it..
a deep sleep.. it's all i need..

i've always longed for that moment where i could place gifts under a christmas tree..
perhaps to hang socks and wait for Sta. Claus to sneak in.. open a present that was meant for me..
to hear him say i've been good all year..

i used to believe in those things..
although i know i shouldn't..

before, i feel so deprived..
to think christmas celebrations are free, i still can't afford it.

it was explained to me as a child..
that i shouldn't wake up at christmas eve..
we can't have the holiday feast.. the holiday gifts.. and the holiday hugs..

it was explained to me as a child..
that His birthday is not on the 25th..
and to celebrate is just so inappropriate..

it was explained to me as a child..
the reasons remained embedded..


after 20 years, 

i felt the breeze..
and at that instant, i felt cold..
i looked outside, i saw fine raindrops.. 
i wished it was snow instead..

i wanna be awake at midnight..
and i'll be thinking of people who are smiling..
of children opening their gifts left under the tree..
and i'll be envious..

i gazed at the stars..
watched them twinkle..
like christmas lights on my neighbors'..
i wished for it to fall down and enlighten my lil' home..

i wanna be awake at midnight..
and i'll be thinking of people who are crying..
of children outside just rubbing their hands together..
and i'll be envious..

i heard the whistling monsoon..
listened for the comforting blows of sound ..
like carollers singin' christmas songs..
 i wished i could do the same..

i wanna be awake at midnight..
just awake.. eyes are open..
i'll just keep myself warm.. covering my body with blanket..

i'll dream about christmas..
and will feel guilty..
for the reasons are still embedded..

then i'll continue to ask why..
try to prove every reason is unjustifiable..
come up with few puzzling explanations..
i'll think of myself as lawbreaker..
feel sorry for the thing i just did..
pray...

then i'll realize..
i still want christmas...

Acknowledgement

Thanks to LKB.. for  your one and only menu.. :) i enjoyed getting ice and pouring it on  plastic glasses..i had a lot of fun memories there that i will surely keep.. 

to the long streets of Annapolis.. that was very strenuous to walk along..
to strepsils.. thanks to your soothing effect..
to mr. i-am-your-friendly-delivery-guy.. for expressing your enormous concern on my health...
to calvin and hobbes.. you were with me through my darkest hours..
to mr. kenny rogers and ms. wendy.. i love being with you guys..
to the CSI team.. to the discovery channel and features showed at national geographic.. i will stay up late for all of you
to the makers of Scrabble.. to my lucky tiles which made me win..
to Cello's donuts..what you've given me is the most exhilarating experience.. i'll treasure that.. promise.

to the incredible x-men i found in the city of angels.. thank you for slaying the fearless pink panther.. and for giving back the eternal sunshine..

to the doors of the palace.. thanks for your hospitality.. late night or early morn, you never hesitated to welcome me.. i owe you a big one.

and to the wall beside my bed (jan sa boarding house ko).. salamat ah? i know.. you're still there willing to support my back.. i don't know how to express my deepest gratitude.. thanks for accepting me.. and all my insanities..


Abstract

     I don't know where to start.. how to summarize it all..sometimes i do feel like i'm completely restless thinking about the same thing over and over again.. it's been a lifetime and i know it's been buried. I'm not trying to relive it but then it keeps on haunting me.. 

     I tried to tell you it's been bothering me but then for some reasons, you didn't care much. It's okay.. i understand we can't just went through experimentation all over again.. initial results showed that a lot of errors were committed along the process.. that's why  we started to use the alternative plan..

Introduction  
     
     All because you were intriguing.. i subjected myself to another chance.. made few rationalizations that i should expose myself to a lot of possiblities.. 
    
     It was none of my intentions..to enter the dangerous realm of love..what i wanted is to scream out my insanities to someone.. hoping i would be understood.  but then the picture of us together pushed through, and it was inevitable.
    
     The rest happened in a single snap of fingers..  issues came and i could feel them moving stealthily in my mind.. i'm sorry i wasn't able to control it.. i'm sorry i let them consume me.

Review of Related Literature 

    
        I conducted a study about it.. contemplated about what i've felt.. tabulated the results from previous studies and compared it to what i have.. but nothing made sense..  Past researches in the same field remained completely useless..  we're doomed.

        I thought i knew everything.. that's why i rushed things out. I thought just like before, everything will be just as simple.. I could just spend another moment alone sitting on the grass.. talk about it with someone till morn.. till 3am.. till 4am.. then the next day i'll be fine. How i wished that was the case.. but my theories are now failing.. all things are working improperly

Results and Analysis  
     
     but you wanted to detach yourself.. that's how i interpreted your actions..i know you have the abiltiy to close your heart forcibly.. but what about me? i couldn't just move on.. having this megaohm of resistance.. it has me completely stuck..
     
    I don't know how to analyze.. Your enigma..made it much worse.. made me felt like i was the only one exerting the effort.. your blank face never left even a single clue.. about what's going on inside.. your silence caused me paranoia.. we could've fixed it.. the situation should then be much better than what it is now.. :(
   
Conclusion 

       Now I wanted to prove that what i felt was just a product of impulsiveness. It was something that should be long forgotten. I wanted to convince myself that i could move on that easily.. just like how i did before. I can walk with my head held high.. making all of them believe that what's inside me is some tolerable pain. 
      I tried hard not to do the usual thing when i'm healing.. i never get away from you.. instead i kept you close and continue living my days -- just like the ordinary ones. But then days made me suffer.. i can't follow the flow chart.. i'm so sorry.. i made assumptions.. and all the while i haven't noticed that i was falling inside an infinite loop
     I haven't been at peace with myself eversince.. i usually arrive at nonsense interpretations.. various tests just made me so disappointed.. i expected too much.. results have taken me nowhere.. left me empty-handed and still broken.. 
   
    I'm still not giving it all up..

    I'm seeing  a lady with so much power and independence.. but on her back what you could see is nothing but emptiness. yeah, nobody will see her cry.. eventhough inside, she's rapidly disintegrating. Once she knew what would bring her immeasurable joy but she let it all slip away.
    I don't wanna see myself there alone, writing some notes on a coffee shop.. reading some notes on the coffee table--  just the thought of it scares me...

Recommendations  
     
     I don't know how will all this still pursue.. i suggest try to keep the faith.. believe in something even if it's almost impossible.. i suppose 'someone' would hear me.. and will help me to continue.. 
     for now, what's more important.. is to fulfill all tasks written on the 'dreams' list..
     time is running fast.. i don't wanna be left behind. 

Bibliography

     My future with you is vivid.. 

     i know 'someone' would find a way.. to reconcile things. I know it's complicated but i'm willing to take the risk..  It wouldn't be easy but 'someone' will offer assistance..i reserved my ears for listening intently for the plans He has for me.. I know it's already been written and inscribed..

I know i'm not the perfect person to write about this sacred topic.. well, i'm not yet married.. not even close to being a family woman. but for me, i think i don't need to be there just to talk about it. I've learned a lot about marriages.. the reason why they succeed and the causes of its failures.. i don't care whether the things i'll be writing here won't make any sense to you.. coz i know for some people.. this won't be meaningless.

MARRIAGE...
          as an extension of engagement

Some of us would think of marriage as a continuation of a special kind of relationship you shared with your partner..It is the perfect  time when you'll be more free to express yourself to someone whom you think saw the light in you. The time of honeymoons.. that strengthen the bonds and keep you closer. The time where you feel like you already belong to someone.. and the time you wanna stay hopeful and optimistic.. about the life very much different from what you had before..

For the bride, the mere fact of having his surname excites you the most.. knowing that somebody owns you now.. that someone is willing to take care of you.. you'll have this feeling that suddenly.. everything is right.. everything is complete.


MARRIAGE...
     as an escape

There are a lot of different reasons for getting married. 

Some couples just felt it.. that it's the only thing that's missing -- the bond. For them, having a relationship that's truly pure and wonderful should be surrendered to a Being with all-embracing authority. They look at it as something created for two lost incomplete souls that have already found their peace in each other's arms. What they wanted is to leave their old unattached self and completely unite to become one..

Some couples felt the need to have it... all because the moment wants it. A child is already at the doors.. just waiting for the 9th month. After some time, they will be parents.. and what they want is the best for the kid.. for it to have an 'ideal' family.. Eventhough they know their not prepared for everything that will come along.. still they took the risk of getting into it. For the baby.. think of the baby. They think it would be easier to just go through the marriage process than to explain it to the child.. 

Some couples have just grown out of the usual relationship. After spending years together and  feeling the accountability towards each other, they decided to take the relationship one step higher.. for it not to remain stagnant.. Individual dreams were realized and there's nothing left for them to do but to conspire their worlds.. in order to make it so alive. There's no more excitement.. boredom's killing both of them.. they have to get away with it..they have to consider the time.. they're aging.. and they need companion.

MARRIAGE...
     as a lifetime commitment


For each decision we make, there comes responsibility not only as  future parents but also as lifetime partners.. 

Sometimes, we think that living in one roof would be enough for a marriage to work out.. well, it doesn't work that way.. 

There will come a point that you might think you're completely tired of it... Having to understand each other, is becoming more and more stressful.. Then you might not notice, you eliminate time for each other.. 

You don't have that much talk about yourselves.. about your insights and the way you feel about certain things. You do think it's not necessary for you to talk about such 'unimportant' details.. Then the four walls of your home seems to leave no room for you to grow.. You'll now think you have done the wrong thing.. because after years of being with your partner, you found yourself feeling so drained..

Now you realize the things that comes with marrying someone. that leaving is not as easy as entering.. You have to consider a lot of stuffs.. especially your children's sake..if there's any..

MARRIAGE...
     as a gift
    
Not everyone got married for the perfect reason.. But if you come to think of it, you had time to back out.. why would you push yourself into doing something that you don't really want... 

you decided at that moment when you swore.. to God and to the people of this world.. that you are willing to accept your partner in times of joy and strife.. till death separates the two of you..

Not because you feel that marriage failed your expectations means that you should run away from it.. Always remember, you are not just your sole self.. you united with your partner and whatever it is that hurt you, could hurt him/her more..

Be matured enough to face the consequences of your actions.. do everything to make it all work out.. be open to one another. about how you feel.. if a marriage would be saved by sacrificing a single-day-compensation.. then it would be all worth it.. pause for a while and listen..to what your partner wanted to convey..

Marriage doesn't assure you of a hundred percent happiness and satisfaction..

...If after contemplating on the life you both shared, you end up feeling so restless and depressed. 
...If instead of becoming someone better, you saw yourself like less of a person. 

Then maybe that's the time to think twice.. review your mistakes..and try to correct them. This time, make it right..

Not everyone had the same gift, and you have to realize that what  you have received is something that's worth keeping, that's why we celebrate weddings.. that's why  we have receptions.. that why we have wedding anniversaries.. it's one good thing that should be cherished for the rest of your lives..

MARRIAGE...
    

I've always believed in the sanctity of marriage.. and i deeply understand that it's something that's ought to be taken seriously.. I don't believe in divorces neither in annulments.. 

i wanted to stay hopeful and optimistic.. i'm still like a little girl who believes in magics, happy endings and the the likes.. hehehe... 

Oddly, never did i imagine myself walking down the aisle.. it's not even in my 'dreams'  list.. Sometimes i would even question the significance of having a marriage.. i'm afraid of risking my life over something i'm not really sure that's of worth.. I already saw what marriage has to offer.. not all of it (*wink) but most of it.. It's just that i do sometimes feel that life is not leading me towards it.. (at saka bata pa talaga ko!!)  or is it just because i'm not in a serious relationship.. (hahaha!)


from the way i see it.. marriage is more than just formality..
more than just signing of contracts and public declarations..
it's something that's so profound and difficult to seek..
and from my viewpoint,
     
     no law ratified by this society can make it null and void...

that's what i wanna believe in..

This are the things closest to reality that i could ever write.

Stop.

I already gave up an important relationship.. and i must say this is the first time i gave up on my friends..
Believe me they really are important. But then how far should i go when everything seems to be destroyed? 
compassion? trust? understanding?

For weeks.. i have been an invisible person to most of them.. 
i can lie and say that i am never affected but then what do i get from lying.. all i have to do is to chill out.. shut up.. and work as if i am completely emotionless..

For weeks, i have been having troubles even with my own self..
 what if all the hurt were just brought by pride or fear of rejection? 
Hell NO. for such a promising relationship i wouldn't care much about damn pride. 
I've proven that a number of times..

For weeks, i've never bother explaining.. 
what the hell am i suppose to say when i don't really know what the problem is all about?

I tried assessing this situation and this is what i've got..


                Friendship is a matter of COMPANIONSHIP as you express yourself to them. I would wanna be with someone who in the presence of all my flaws still appreciates the REAL HUMAN in me. I wanna be with a person who will not try to deceive me as i keep myself open to them. I won't keep a person who sees me DIFFERENT from the way that i really am..
                Friendship, if i'm not mistaken, just like any relationship, is two-way. It involves commitment.. of trust and compassion..
                I am never the kind of person who judges my friends. I was led to believe that you trust people especially when they don't show you anything that will make you withdraw such trust.
                I am not the type who  seems to be so distant. For me, the very purpose of friendship is for you to be able to share your life to someone else.. hope that they can learn something from you.. help them out in any way.. 
              
To whoever will react on these statements this is what i can say: 

                Never did i doubt you.. from the very beginning up to the end.. it was out of my purest intentions to help you out and give you time to think things through.. I can never deny the fact that things became so much unbearable for me.. but as unbearable as it is, i am not ashamed to admit that i DISCUSSED it WITH people who i think is CONCERNED, INVOLVED and DESERVED to know what  the problem is. They are not MECHANICAL robots who will follow everything that we say.. They are not INSENSITIVE.. They can FEEL more than how we expect them how to feel. 
                But never did i judge you..i just gave them fair sides of the ISSUE that for them was NOT a NEW thing.. DO your homework.. make your researches complete before you draw conclusions about me.

                Still trying to be the good old friend that i WAS to you.. i didn't bother to explain.. i am not in defense of  anything especially to people who accuses me of invading something that is PRIVATE. How could something like that be INEVITABLE? In a little world such as ours? with the kind of people roaming around?  People can sense and too bad i wasn't able to CONTROL how they think... I never lit a fire.. YOU and YOUR actions DID!!!!  now I get all the blames. fair enough, isn't it? it is just because of my stupidity that i thought i can be your Superfriend who will rescue you from your darkest moments. 
                I will remain being the good friend that i am  to those people who bothers to know the EXTENT of what i d0 and what my reactions are.. to those people who manages to tell me 'fuck you and get lost'  right on my face.. who never gave me insincere smiles.. who instead tells me what is it that i do wrong  in order for me to understand.. 

               In this situation, you looked like the oppressed.. for being so silent and containing your anger to your friends.. while showing how fucked up you are to the Whole Wide World! you only give other people ideas to talk about you.. to investigate on what it is that makes you feel resentful.SHOUT IT OUT to the world who doesn't care whether you put yourself in a shitty situation. You have just showed me the way to immaturely attack the situation. Tell your so-called FRIENDS.. who just behind your back laughs at your issues just because they can't comprehend. 

                It's just that i am completely tired of this. Me, just accepting anything.. all your blabbering and indirect resentments. I am not willing to suffer from the consequences of your actions. I warned you.. just because i care so much... that this can't be hidden for all of time. They believe what they perceive. They talk about what makes them tick.. And it is clear injustice for my part if such things will be blamed upon me. I may be the one to know.. but isn't it possible for them to learn it in a way in which i don't have to teach? This is the reality  in such a place filled with the "WISEST" people.
               I won't allow more things to be said about me.. by those people who just CLAIM to know who i am.  ..I tried to understand that all things were said due to this BLINDING moment. But they were too much for me to handle.. Talk about HONESTY, talk about TRUST and talk about JUDGMENTS.. but not to ME!!!!!   Yeah, i am not the NICE person you will ever encounter.. but i know how to handle my friendships very well..  

                 Among us, in this scene.. i was the one who didn't pay much attention. It is because..

                              i think before i act.. 
                              i know what to say.. 
                              what not to say.. .
                              even to the person i kiss..

                  My whole point upon writing all these stuff is for you to leave it all alone.. we can't and personally, i won't make the friendship flourish again.. i am completely out of your beloved circle.. If being included means TELLING LIES and being SUPERFICIAL about myself.. just go on and rejoice in HEAVEN.. i'll be more happy living in HELL with my FANGS sticking out.
                   To you, who's claiming all the hurt. Just find peace within yourself. You actions tells me that you still have none.
